text: Hey everybody, we’re adding a little more flair to Little Friday and need your help! Instead of drawing little paper faces to find our hosts, we’re going to draw wooden tokens. If you have time before 1pm today, head over to the social space and create a token for yourself. Do what you want with it, just make sure it has your name on it! (If you have questions, feel free to pm me or tag me in <#C0260V1C3> :wink:)
